title: Golden Cogs Watch Face
summary: Watch face with moving golden cogs and useful informations
developerAddress: Rasimpaşa Mh., Duatepe Sk No:61, 34716 Kadıköy/İstanbul
description: Golden cogs will make you feel like you have a real luxurious watch.USEFUL INFORMATIONSYou can change informations just by tapping.✔ Watch battery level✔ Phone battery level✔ Daily step countCUSTOMIZATION✔ Customizable ambient mode✔ Customizable time formatCOMPATIBILITYSupport both round and square watches.Compatible with:✔ Moto 360✔ Moto 360 2nd generation✔ Moto 360 Sport✔ LG G Watch R✔ LG G Watch✔ LG Watch Urbane✔ LG Watch Urbane 2nd Edition✔ Asus ZenWatch ✔ Asus ZenWatch 2✔ Sony Smartwatch 3✔ Samsung Gear Live✔ Huawei Watch✔ TAG Heuer Connected✔ Fossil Q Founder✔ Casio Smart Outdoor WatchFollow us:Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Peppy_WorksFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/PeppyWorksSupportFor any questions or comments on our watch faces, reach out to us at: support@peppyworks.com
descriptionHTML:
Golden cogs will make you feel like you have a real luxurious watch.

USEFUL INFORMATIONS
You can change informations just by tapping.
✔ Watch battery level
✔ Phone battery level
✔ Daily step count

CUSTOMIZATION
✔ Customizable ambient mode
✔ Customizable time format

COMPATIBILITY
Support both round and square watches.
Compatible with:
✔ Moto 360
✔ Moto 360 2nd generation
✔ Moto 360 Sport
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ LG G Watch
✔ LG Watch Urbane
✔ LG Watch Urbane 2nd Edition
✔ Asus ZenWatch
✔ Asus ZenWatch 2
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Huawei Watch
✔ TAG Heuer Connected
✔ Fossil Q Founder
✔ Casio Smart Outdoor Watch


Follow us:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Peppy_Works
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PeppyWorks

Support
For any questions or comments on our watch faces, reach out to us at: support@peppyworks.com
comments: Where do I start This watchface is one of the best it runs so smoothly and doesn't drain the battery to much which of me is a big deal. I would definitely pick this one up
THANKS! Brilliant Watch Face, plus I got it for free thanks to their instagram code giveaway! Not much more I could ask for!
Not bad Needs some more customisation options. The red band around it is a little weird...
